body_html:
We currently support building with CUDA 8.0.
Building with earlier CUDA versions is supported only as best effort. However these days there are a few higher priority issues we need to focus on.
I will mark this issue as community support, maybe someone from the community can help.

body:
We currently support building with CUDA 8.0.
Building with earlier CUDA versions is supported only as best effort. However these days there are a few higher priority issues we need to focus on.
I will mark this issue as community support, maybe someone from the community can help.
